Question: This person was born on January 12, 1954, into a Jewish family who lived in Jackson Heights, Queens in New York City.
Hints: In 2002, this person acquired the rights to comedy films Rock 'n' Roll High School (1979) and Porky's (1982).
This person performs on its soundtrack which charted at number one on the Billboard 200.
